channel.title: potato on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in potato on Recipes

item.title: baked chicken with duchess puree
item.description: Ingredients RECIPE1 1 chicken salt at ease pepper cognac a quarter pound of butter RECIPE2 2 pounds of potatoes water salt to taste half a pound of butter pepper grated nutmeg 2 egg yolks a quarter of milk cream 6 tablespoons grated cheese Directions RECIPE1 Clean the chicken, go, wash it and dry it, season it with salt, spray the cog√±ac and place it in the mold you are going to use for roasting.

item.title: liver fillets
item.description: Ingredients liver fillets flour salt oil a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter a glass of Marsala wine cooked spinach lard cooked potatoes Directions Cut some liver fillets by touching the telita and nerves and pass them through flour and season with salt. Put in a frying pan half a cup of oil, heat well and brown the encores then add a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter, a glass of Marsala wine, cover and let it boil slowly until the fillets are cooked and the sauce reduced.

item.title: potato cream soup
item.description: Ingredients 6 tablespoons butter 2 teaspoons salt 1-4 teaspoon pepper 3 tablespoons tri flour go 6 cups of hot milk 1 tablespoon grated onion 2 cups mashed potatoes Directions Prepare the bechamel by melting the butter. Add salt, pepper and flour and stir until it forms a pass. Pour the hot milk and onion and move constantly. When it boils add the mashed potatoes. Serve hot.

item.title: seafood salad
item.description: Ingredients 1 can of salmon 3 cooked potatoes 2 hard-boiled eggs 6 green and 6 black olives thin slices of onion lettuce leaves 1-2 cup oil 1 teaspoon salt the juice of a lemon 1 tomato Directions in a dish, lettuce leaves, on top of thinly sliced potatoes, onion, salmon season with salt, oil and lemon and garnish with tomato, hard-boiled egg slices and olives.
